page.title: 08A TYPICAL SOUTH LAKES FARM
page.content: out with the mowing at silage & hay times.The main changes which have taken place in agriculture over the last 20 years have been,changes in breeding,allowing much better dairy animal to be reared.A large increase in capital investment in agriculture.More recently the cutback in dairy products.The main problem with farming today compared with 20 years ago is:-20 years ago the difference between investment and profit was economically viable. Nowadays the difference between investment and profit isn't economically viable and speaking in real terms the farmer of today would be much better off selling up and investing the money in shares or in a building society.In recent years many of the smaller farms have done just that.
